cells.name: Property Code
cells.description: Client (or client vendor) designated property code (is used as a key linking field) Must be the same for all modules. Example: Apollo GDS Property Code 123456

cells.name: Internal Hotel Reference Code
cells.description: The internal hotel reference code that is assigned by the chain or parent company for tracking the individual hotel. It must be the same for all modules. It may be left blank. (Buyers, do not use this to link modules)

cells.name: Property Name
cells.description: Hotel Name Example: "Eaton Place Hotel". Please input in appropriate case.

cells.name: Property Address
cells.description: Hotel Street Address, Line 1 Example: 100 Main Street. Please input in appropriate case.

cells.name: Additional Address
cells.description: Hotel Street Address, Line 2. Please input in appropriate case. (If not applicable, leave blank)

cells.name: City
cells.description: Hotel City Name Example: Toronto. Please input in appropriate case.

cells.name: State/Province
cells.description: Two character U.S. state or Canadian province abbreviation (Applies only to U.S. & Canada addresses) Example: NY

cells.name: County
cells.description: Full county name Example: Montgomery

cells.name: Region
cells.description: Province or territory name if not U.S. or Canada address Example: Australian Province name

cells.name: Country
cells.description: Full country name Example: United States

cells.name: Postal/Zip Code
cells.description: Hotel Postal Code or Zip Code Example: M5G 2L0 or 80202

cells.name: Phone Country Code
cells.description: Main phone country code Example: 44

cells.name: Phone City Code
cells.description: Main phone city code or area code Example: 625

cells.name: Main Phone Number
cells.description: Main phone local number Example: 555888

cells.name: Fax Country Code
cells.description: Main fax country code Example: 44

cells.name: Fax City/Area Code
cells.description: Main fax city code or area code Example: 625

cells.name: Main Fax Number
cells.description: Main fax local number Example: 444777

cells.name: Unit of measure for distance related questions throughout profile
cells.description: This question only needs to be answered once and will apply to all other questions where KM or MI applies.

cells.name: Property Website (URL Address)
cells.description: Hotel Internet Address Example: www.Hotel.com/canada/headtext.html

cells.name: Property sales general email address
cells.description: Generic email address of sales department on property, which will be used as a backup if the email address of the sales contact is not deliverable. Example: sales@hotel.com
